name: Find 24
description:
Welcome to Find 24!

Can you find 24 (or 10... or 15... or 48...)?

Four numbers are displayed.  Can you use your wits to make them add, subtract, divide or multiple to match your goal (look in the lower left-hand side of the screen)?  

Unlike regular math, the result is calculated by evaluating the equation from left to right. (That is, you should ignore the regular order of operations in math.)

Example.  5 + 2 × 4 − 4 is 24.  (5+2=7; 7×4=28; 28−4=24) 

Good luck! 🍀

* * *

Find 24 is built using the LÖVE2d framework.
It is inspired by the game 24.
All emojis designed by OpenMoji – the open-source emoji and icon project. License: CC BY-SA 4.0.
